title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water according to package instructions.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then mix in the cheese and a good grinding of black pepper.
Drain the pasta and immediately toss with the pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve immediately, with extra cheese and black pepper on top.
